text: Shanthakumari (55), wife of Ganeshan of Vannarpettai in Tirunelveli was killed near Kovilpatti in an accident on Madurai bypass road on Thursday night around 11.30 p.m. According to police sources, a truck hit the rear side of a bus, which was stationed on the road after it suffered a breakdown. The Madurai-bound bus was thrown out of the service road at the accident site. Except the victim, all other passengers had alighted from the bus following the breakdown when the accident occurred. The truck driver, S. Kannagaraj (54), suffered injuries, and has been admitted to Kovilpatti Government Headquarters Hospital. Based on a complaint lodged by M. Ganesan (63), husband of the deceased, Kovilpatti West police have filed a case.
title: Woman killed
